section.title: Overview
section.para: This is a simple project to illustrate the generation of documentation from DocBook5 sources using maven.

section.title: Requisites
section.para: Although it is supposed to work with maven2 and any java sdk newer than 1.4.

section.title: Usage
section.para: Check docbkx documentation for additional goals docbkxdoc.
section.programlisting: $ mvn docbkx:generate-html // generate output $ xdg-open target/docbkx/html/article/article.html // default browser displays output
